title: Happily Ever After
description: Throughout time, folk stories and fairy tales have had young women waiting to be rescued by a dashing hero. They are sitting around no more! The adapted and original stories in the entertaining Girls to the Rescue series send girls to do the saving. With stories from around the world--a Chinese girl who saves her village from starvation; a Sicilian girl who outsmarts a greedy merchant--this book has multicultural appeal.
author: Bruce Lansky
